lessonContent_en:
The anchor (a) tag is one of the most important elements in HTML. It allows you to link to other web pages, creating a network of information on the web. Without links, navigating between pages would be nearly impossible, making the internet a static place. Whether you're linking to internal pages or external websites, the tag is essential for making the web functional and interactive.

Mastering the use of the tag will open up new possibilities for your web projects!
